title: Ep. 542 - Shell Game Shutdown
description:
While everyone is distracted with the latest drama about masks and meat shortages, lots of strange stuff is going on out of the political spotlight. From Obama era coverups to environmental overhauls, the shutdowns are starting to feel like a shell game. Then, the remaining half dozen #NeverTrumpers remind us why we got rid of them in the first place, and finally the Mailbag!

If you like The Michael Knowles Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: KNOWLES and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at https://www.dailywire.com/Knowles
